name: Linux School
tagline: A collection of documents and scripts to allow the easy creation of a linux client/server network for schools (or anyone else)
body:
### How to set up a Linux based school network
Please contribute more detailed information so this can be a start to finish guide to setting up a complete Linux network for schools.
### Server OS
Debian. [Auto install debian server](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ueBo_nBfurgBniV6mf38xs_8Mn4tforYmpPV9mKNJuk/pub)
